ddi:titlStmt.ddi:parTitl: Migration between western and northern part of the Netherlands 1971

ddi:rspStmt.ddi:AuthEnty: Woldringh, C.L., Instituut voor toegepaste sociologie, ITS * Nijmegen (primary investigator)
Steering committee of the ministerij of social affairs * Den Haag (research initiator)

ddi:stdyInfo.ddi:abstract: Migrants migration history / geographical mobility / evaluation of housing conditions / housing environment, facilities / occupational history, mobility / job satisfaction / evaluation of characteristics of job / family relations and contacts / motivation to migrate / leisure possibilities / perception of new situation before migration / how one found new job / general preference to live in village versus centre of big city / preference for living in certain regions of the country / present situation compared to the previous one. Non-migrants special questions on evaluation of present housing / job / environment situation and feeling in relation to it / image of some regions in the Netherlands / tendency to migrate. Background variables: basic characteristics/ residence/ housing situation/ household characteristics/ occupation/employment/ income/capital assets/ education/ organizational membership
